ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

Class UltrasonicPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.UltrasonicPoller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UltrasonicPoller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A poller for the ultrasonic sensor. It runs continuously in its own thread, polling the sensor about every 50 ms. After getting a value from the sensor, it will convert the distance into centimeters and assign it to the distance variable. This variable can be accessed by other classes by calling getDistance().
